CustomField.formula: IF ( IsRecurring__c , IMAGE("/img/recurring_activity.gif", "Recurring") & " " & HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=00b30000001v6rv&eid="& TaskRecurrenceId__c , "Delete Series","_top") & " " & HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=00b30000001v6rw&eid="& TaskRecurrenceId__c , "Change Series Owner","_top"), "Individual Task" )
CustomField.label: Task Series
